scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src -d es/src; cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel lib -d es/lib; cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel index.js -d es; babel types/*.d.ts -d es --copy-files
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src -d cjs/src; cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel lib -d cjs/lib; cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel index.js -d cjs; babel types/*.d.ts -d cjs --copy-files
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es BUNDLE_TYPE=normal rollup -c -i index.js -o dist/Dropbox-sdk.js -n Dropbox; babel types/*.d.ts -d dist --copy-files
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es BUNDLE_TYPE=minified rollup -c -i index.js -o dist/Dropbox-sdk.min.js -n Dropbox
scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.test: npm run test:typescript && npm run test:unit
scripts.publish-docs: rm -rf docs && npm run generate-docs && gh-pages -d docs
scripts.coverage:unit: cross-env BABEL_ENV=coverage nyc --reporter=lcov npm run test:unit
scripts.coverage:integration: cross-env BABEL_ENV=coverage nyc --reporter=lcov npm run test:integration
